title: Marketing & Campaign Design for James Bond Look-Alike Cosplay Contest ($5,000 in 007 NFTs)
summary: We’re hosting a James Bond look-alike cosplay contest, where participants compete for a $5,000 prize pool paid in exclusive 007 NFTs. We’re looking for a freelancer to design and run a marketing campaign that mixes spy-thriller flair with modern Web3 culture, driving buzz, sign-ups, and community engagement. The campaign should feel cinematic, stylish, and irresistible to both Bond fans and NFT collectors.

milestones.title: Phase 1 – Concept & Creative Direction
milestones.description: Develop a campaign theme that merges James Bond aesthetics (sleek, high-stakes, iconic) with NFT/Web3 culture. Produce branded assets, teaser visuals, and a promotional content calendar.

milestones.title: Phase 2 – Campaign Activation
milestones.description: Launch a multi-channel marketing push across social media, cosplay communities, NFT/crypto spaces, and fan forums. Partner with influencers and Bond fan clubs to maximise reach and build hype.

milestones.title: Phase 3 – Contest Engagement & Legacy
milestones.description: Manage live engagement during the contest (social updates, voting campaigns, highlight reels). Deliver a post-event package that includes contest recaps, NFT showcase drops, and a content archive that extends the excitement beyond the event.

email.subject: New Proposal: Marketing & Campaign Design for James Bond Look-Alike Cosplay Contest ($5,000 in 007 NFTs) from Margsate Flether
email.previewText: Margsate Flether has sent you a proposal for "Marketing & Campaign Design for James Bond Look-Alike Cosplay Contest ($5,000 in 007 NFTs)" with a budget of $5,001
